Scene.Name: cave
Scene.Description:
You find yourself waking up in a dark area. You don't know where you are but you know you have to get out of this place!
Too bad it's pitch black... But then you remember -thankfully- you have a torch in your pocket.

args.arg: You look around and find a long corridor. You start following it.
You stumble around in the dark until you get tired. You're lucky you didn't injure yourself.
You light the torch and illuminate the area around you. It turns out you are in a cave!

Scene.Name: forest
Scene.Description:
As you keep walking you can feel a breeze of fresh air and you know you're near the exit. Indeed, you find the exit and leave the cave.
You are now in a forest.
Congratulations, you escaped from the cave!
